THE REALITY

Why students struggle at this level.

  • Struggling to bridge the huge gap between GCSE and A-Level.
  • Confused by abstract concepts in Integration or Mechanics.
  • Panicking about University entrance requirements.
  • Feeling unsupported by large classes.
The GG Method

How we secure the top grades.

  • 24/7 Portal Access: Thousands of exam questions sorted by topic and difficulty for structured revision.
  • Structured bridging modules to fix gaps and solidify algebraic foundations.
  • Visual, intuitive explanations for complex calculus and mechanics.
  • Exam-specific strategy coaching to maximise mark allocation.
Secure your A-Level Maths Grade

More Than Just Tutoring

A holistic approach designed for high performance.

The Habit Portal

We don't just teach once a week. You get 24/7 access to our custom portal to practice exam questions daily and build the 'habit' of success.

Spaced Repetition

We use cognitive science to schedule topic reviews exactly when you are about to forget them, locking knowledge into long-term memory.

The 'Exam' Mindset

Knowing the maths isn't enough. We coach time management, mark allocation, and how to stay calm under pressure.

Common Questions

Do you cover the 'Large Data Set' for Edexcel/AQA?

Yes. This is often neglected in schools. We dedicate specific sessions to navigating the data set so students are comfortable with it before the exam.

Which calculator do we need?

For A-Level, we strongly recommend the Casio CG-50 (Graphical). We teach students how to use it to check their answers and gain 'free marks'.

How much homework is set?

Expect about 1-2 hours per week via our Portal. It is targeted practice, not busy work.

Do you offer group classes?

This page is for our premium 1-to-1 tuition. However, we do run small-group revision bootcamps during Easter.
